typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SOURCE_CODE_KEY as string,
		SOURCE_SYSTEM as string,
		TARGET_CODE as string,
		TARGET_DESCRIPTION as string,
		CODE_TYPE as string,
		CODE_TYPE_ID as double,
		CODE2 as string,
		OM_X_REF as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> TCrossReference
TCrossReference filter(CODE_TYPE_ID == 106.0 && TARGET_CODE != 'PI') ~> FilterCodetypeIDandTargetCode
FilterCodetypeIDandTargetCode aggregate(groupBy(TARGET_CODE),
	TARGET_DESCRIPTION = first(TARGET_DESCRIPTION)) ~> AggregateTargetCode
AggregateTargetCode derive(TOP_KEY = 'ALL',
		TOP_DESCRIPTION = 'All Business Areas',
		GRP_KEY = case(TARGET_CODE =='EN' || TARGET_CODE =='BU', 'EG', case( TARGET_CODE =='PM' || TARGET_CODE =='PF', 'PI', TARGET_CODE)),
		GRP_DESCRIPTION = case(TARGET_CODE =='EN' || TARGET_CODE =='BU', 'Energy+', case( TARGET_CODE =='PM' || TARGET_CODE =='PF', 'P&I', TARGET_CODE)),
		BUA_KEY = case( TARGET_CODE =='PM' || TARGET_CODE =='PF', 'PI', TARGET_CODE),
		BUA_DESCRIPTION = case( TARGET_CODE =='PM' || TARGET_CODE =='PF', 'P&I', TARGET_CODE)) ~> DeriveTopGrpBus
DeriveTopGrpBus derive(each(match(!startsWith(name,'TOP')), $$ = '')) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 aggregate(groupBy(TOP_KEY),
	each(match(name!='TOP_KEY'), $$ = first($$))) ~> Aggregate1
DeriveTopGrpBus derive(each(match(!startsWith(name,'TOP')&&!startsWith(name,'GRP')), $$ = '')) ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn2 aggregate(groupBy(GRP_KEY),
	each(match(name!='GRP_KEY'), $$ = first($$))) ~> Aggregate2
DeriveTopGrpBus derive(each(match(!startsWith(name,'TOP')&&!startsWith(name,'GRP')&&!startsWith(name,'BUA')), $$ = '')) ~> DerivedColumn3
DerivedColumn3 aggregate(groupBy(BUA_KEY),
	each(match(name!='BUA_KEY'), $$ = first($$))) ~> Aggregate3
Aggregate1, Aggregate2 union(byName: true)~> UnionTopGrp
UnionTopGrp, Aggregate3 union(byName: true)~> UnionGrpBua
DeriveTopGrpBus select(mapColumn(
		TARGET_CODE,
		TARGET_DESCRIPTION,
		TOP_KEY,
		TOP_DESCRIPTION,
		GRP_KEY,
		GRP_DESCRIPTION,
		BUA_KEY,
		BUA_DESCRIPTION
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectAll
UnionBuaBus keyGenerate(output(DIMENSION_KEY as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKeyDIMid
SurrogateKeyDIMid derive(TOP_ID = case(GRP_KEY=='', DIMENSION_KEY*-1, toLong(0)),
		GRP_ID = case(BUA_KEY==''&&GRP_KEY!='',DIMENSION_KEY*-1,toLong(0)),
		BUA_ID = case(TARGET_CODE==''&&BUA_KEY!='', DIMENSION_KEY*-1, toLong(0)),
		BUS_ID = case(TARGET_CODE!='', DIMENSION_KEY, toLong(0)),
		DIMENSION_KEY = case(GRP_KEY=='', DIMENSION_KEY*-1, 
    case(BUA_KEY=='', DIMENSION_KEY*-1, 
        case(TARGET_CODE=='', DIMENSION_KEY*-1, DIMENSION_KEY)))) ~> DerivedColumnTOPlevel
Join6 select(mapColumn(
		DIMENSION_KEY,
		TOP_ID = TOP_ID2,
		TOP_KEY = TOP_KEY2,
		TOP_DESCRIPTION,
		GRP_ID = GRP_ID2,
		GRP_KEY = GRP_KEY2,
		GRP_DESCRIPTION,
		BUA_ID = BUA_ID2,
		BUA_KEY = BUA_KEY2,
		BUA_DESCRIPTION,
		BUS_ID = BUS_ID2,
		BUS_KEY,
		BUS_DESCRIPTION = TARGET_DESCRIPTION
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
DerivedColumnTOPlevel filter(TOP_ID != 0) ~> FilterTop
DerivedColumnTOPlevel filter(GRP_ID != 0) ~> FilterGRP
DerivedColumnTOPlevel filter(BUA_ID != 0) ~> FilterBUA
FilterBUA select(mapColumn(
		BUA_KEY2 = BUA_KEY,
		BUA_ID2 = BUA_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectBUA
FilterGRP select(mapColumn(
		GRP_KEY2 = GRP_KEY,
		GRP_ID2 = GRP_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectGRP
FilterTop select(mapColumn(
		TOP_KEY2 = TOP_KEY,
		TOP_ID2 = TOP_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectTOP
DerivedColumnTOPlevel, SelectTOP join(TOP_KEY == TOP_KEY2,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1
Join1, SelectGRP join(GRP_KEY == GRP_KEY2,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join2
Join2, SelectBUA join(BUA_KEY == BUA_KEY2,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join3
Select1 sort(asc(abs(DIMENSION_KEY), true)) ~> SortDimKey
UnionGrpBua, SelectAll union(byName: true)~> UnionBuaBus
DerivedColumnTOPlevel filter(BUS_ID != 0) ~> FilterBUS
FilterBUS select(mapColumn(
		BUS_KEY = TARGET_CODE,
		BUS_ID2 = BUS_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectBUS
Join3, SelectBUS join(TARGET_CODE == BUS_KEY,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join6
